channel.description: The Dave Ramsey Show is about real life and how it revolves around money. Dave Ramsey teaches you to manage and budget your money, get out of debt, build wealth, and live in financial peace. Managing your money properly will reduce stress, improve your marriage, and provide security for you and your family. Updated: Fri, 21 Mar 2014 16:00:00 -0500
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Dave Ramsey Show is about real life and how it revolves around money. Dave Ramsey teaches you to manage and budget your money, get out of debt, build wealth, and live in financial peace. Updated: Fri, 21 Mar 2014 16:00:00 -0500
